attributes.additional_details: If the majority of people want an Election and the chance to decide if we leave on 31st deal or no deal under a democracy it is only right their views are heard.
attributes.background:
I voted Leave along with the majority. I fully expected us to leave with or without a deal.  It is now three years on and Politicians are conspiring to thwart the will of the majority. 

I demand an October election so Parliament can again represent what the  majority of this Country want.
